h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Wind King
content: After his next Black Wind assault, be ready to transform using the Red Tides Spell, and charge up a dash attack the moment he lands in the center of the arena, and use it and the transformation spell’s pogo attack to perform a massive hit once you catch him after a teleport.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Wind King'.
The content is as follows:
After his next Black Wind assault, be ready to transform using the Red Tides Spell, and charge up a dash attack the moment he lands in the center of the arena, and use it and the transformation spell’s pogo attack to perform a massive hit once you catch him after a teleport.
